moves.name: X Sp. Def All
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Def of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: We’ve Got Tricks!
moves.effect: Raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank. Uses a maximum of 3 slot of the user’s move gauge. The more amount used, the more this move raises Attack and Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs (can be raised by up to 4 stat ranks maximum).

passives.name: Propelling Move 5
passives.description: Has a chance (60%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when its Pokémon uses a move.

passives.name: First Aid 4
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Team Inflict and Heal 3
passives.description: Has a chance (40%) of restoring the HP of all allied sync pairs when a status move used by the user’s Pokémon is successful.

grid.bonus: X Sp. Def All:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Sing:Move Gauge Refresh 1- Has a chance (20%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Sparkling Aria:Defense Crush 4- Has a chance (50%) of lowering the target’s Defense by one stat rank when an attack move against it is successful.
Sparkling Aria:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Sparkling Aria:Mind Games 4- Has a chance (50%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Def by one stat rank when the user’s attack move is successful.
Sparkling Aria:Trip Up 4- Has a chance (50%) of lowering the target’s Speed by one stat rank when the user’s attack move is successful.
Sparkling Aria:Team Fast-Track 4- Has a chance (50%) of raising the Speed of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.
We’ve Got Tricks!:MP Refresh 1- Has a chance (20%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Power Reserves 4- Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.
Quick Cure- Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user the first time they are inflicted each battle.
Impatient 1- Has a chance (20%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when it is hit by an attack move.
Sentry Entry 1- Raises the user’s Defense by 1 stat rank when it enters a battle.
Good Night-mare 3- Powers up the user’s moves when the target is asleep.
Team Sync Cure 9- Removes all status conditions from all allied sync pairs after using the user’s sync move.
Team Critical Nightmare 3- Has a chance (40%) of raising the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user’s attack move is successful against an opponent that is asleep.
